title: Bridges Closed during the Inauguration, 2009
name: Bridges Closed during the Inauguration, 2009
description: This data was extracted manually from a PDF map of the Secret Services Inauguration Transportation Plan from the Washington Post. Sources were United States Secret Service, Homeland Security and Emergency Management Agency. I took the Bridges listed in the map and used Google Earth to geocode them and uploaded this data as a csv into Geocommons.

properties.whocanuse: Inbound lanes off limits to private vehicles; buses and authorized vehicles only(incluces taxicabs and limousines with valid licenses)
